meanings.definition: A small, painless lump on the eyelid caused by inflammation of a blocked oil gland.
meanings.sent1: The chalazion on her eyelid was barely noticeable.
meanings.sent2: He went to the doctor to have his chalazion examined.
meanings.sent3: The chalazion decided to take a vacation from the eyelid.
meanings.sent4: Her chalazion felt like a tiny pebble under her skin.
meanings.sent5: The chalazion resembled a tiny pearl on her eyelid.

meanings.sent1: They all had chalazions on their eyelids.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the treatment options for chalazions.
meanings.sent3: The chalazions gathered for a group photo on the eyelids.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of eyelids, chalazions bloomed like flowers.
meanings.sent5: The chalazions twinkled like stars on their eyelids.
